about_p1: I'm a photographer and videographer based in Italy. I have worked with several local clients and gained experience as an in-house photographer for a local company. I love capturing the beauty of everyday life through my lens â€” whether it's a sweeping landscape, a candid moment, or a carefully composed portrait.
